revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 70:;Petheus, son of Ptollis, grandson of Herakles, mother Thases, drachmas 4;;Pakysis, son of Phasis, grandson of Esouris, mother Tanomgeus, drachmas 4;;Melanas, son of Melanas, grandson of Pakysis, mother Taeuhemeros, drachmas 8;;Isas, son of Harpalos, grandson of Apion, mother Diodora, drachmas 12;;Ptolemaios, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Satabous, mother Heras, drachmas 4;;Julius Apolinarios (Nikephoros);;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 16 obols 4.5 chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives drachmas 2 obols 5.5 chalki 2, naubion drachma 1 obol 4 chalki 2, surcharges drachmas 4 obols 2;;(in left margin: drachmas 104 obols 27, eparourion drachmas 15 obol 1, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos obols 4 chalki 2, in total drachmas 42 obols 5.5 chalki 2;;and to Horigenis alias Herais;;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 3 obols 4.5, tax on the produce of olives obols 3 chalki 2, naubion obols 2 chalki 2, surcharges obols 5.5 chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 2 obols 3, surcharges obol 1 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1, in total drachmas 8 obols 3;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 41 obols 5.5 chalki 2, surcharges drachmas 2 obols 4, in total drachmas 44 obols 3.5 chalki 2;;other taxes geometria for the 12th year drachmas 9 obols 2 chalki 2, surcharges obols 3.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 10;;Horos, son of Anchophis, grandson of Herakles, mother Teseuris, drachmas 4;;in total for the day drachmas 196 obols 27.;Pauni 1:;Tathautis, daughter of Ptollis (Petheus, barber);;(in left margin: drachmas 12 obols 24) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 2 obols 5.5 chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives obols 2.5, naubion obol 1.5 chalki 2, surcharges obols 4.5;;eparourion drachmas 2, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 6 obols 4 chalki 2;;geometria for the 12th year drachmas 7 obols 2 chalki 2, surcharges obols 3, in total drachmas 7 obols 5 chalki 2;;Petaus, son of Petaus, grandson of Petheus, mother Isis, drachmas 8;;Pnepheros, his brother with the same mother, drachmas 8;;Petheus, son of Pankrates, grandson of Ptolemaios, mother Dioskorous, drachmas 20;;Phaesis, son of Petheus through the agency of Heras (Nemesas);;(in left margin: drachmas 36 obols 23) orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 5 obols 3, tax on the produce of olives obols 5.5 chalki 2, naubion obols 3.5, surcharges drachma 1 obols 2.5;;eparourion drachmas 3 obols 4, surcharges obols 2, kollybos obols 1.5, in total drachmas 12 obols 4 chalki 2;;and Julius Sempronianus;;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 3 obols 4.5, tax on the produce of olives obols 5.5, naubion obols 2.5, surcharges drachma 1 chalki 2;;eparourion drachmas 2 obols 3, surcharges obol 1.5, kollybos obol 1, in total drachmas 9 chalki 2;;naubion of katoikoi for the 13th year drachma 1 obols 2.5, surcharges obol 1, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachma 1 obols 3.5 chalki 2;;Apion, son of Herakleides;;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachmas 2 obols 3, tax on the produce of olives obols 2 chalki 2, naubion obol 1.5, surcharges obols 3.5 chalki 2;;eparourion drachma 1 obols 4, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 5 obols 4 chalki 2;;Chairemon, son of Sarapion;;orchard taxes for the 12th year apomoira drachma 1 obol 1.5, tax on the produce of olives obol 1.5, naubion obol 1 chalki 2, surcharges obols 2.5;;eparourion drachma 1 chalki 2, surcharges obol 0.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 0.5, in total drachmas 3 obols 4 chalki 2."

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
